title: Calculate the percentage of Danaos Corporation's (NYSE:DAC) FY 2024 total comprehensive income that was attributable to unrealized fair-value movements on the Companyâ€™s investment in Star Bulk Carriers Corp. (NASDAQ: SBLK). Round to the nearest two decimals.
description:
1) Find FY 2024 total comprehensive income as $510.622 million. 
 
 2) Identify FY 2024 unrealized fair value movement on the SBLK investment as a $25.2 million loss in FY2024. 
 
 3. Calculate the percentage of FY2024 total comprehensive income as -25.2 million/510.622 million *100=-4.94% since the fair value movement was negative.

rubric.criteria: Find Danaos's FY2024 total comprehensive income as $510.622 million
Find Danaos's FY2024 unrealized fair value movement on its SBLK investment as -$25.2 million
Calculated the percentage as (-$25.2 million / $510.622 million) * 100 = -4.94%
